entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
